00085 class FunctionParameterValueBase {
00086     public:
00088 
00090         struct WrongParameterTypeException: public std::logic_error {
00091             WrongParameterTypeException(const std::string &_class,
00092                                         const std::string &_function,
00093                                         const std::string &_type):
00094                 std::logic_error("Tried to call default implementation for "+
00095                                  _class+"::"+_function+"("+_type+")!") { }
00096         };
00097 
00098         /* I have to declare the getters and setters for every type of
00099            derived classes that will be instantiated. PITA.
00100            what's worse, i have to define no-ops as default implementation,
00101            because otherwise the templated derived class would remain
00102            abstract. that totally breaks type-safety during compilation.      */
00104         virtual void setValue(const double &) {
00105             throw WrongParameterTypeException("FunctionParameterValueBase",
00106                                               "setValue", "double");
00107         }
00109         virtual void setValue(const unsigned &) {
00110             throw WrongParameterTypeException("FunctionParameterValueBase",
00111                                               "setValue", "unsigned");
00112         }
00114         virtual void setValue(const int &) {
00115             throw WrongParameterTypeException("FunctionParameterValueBase",
00116                                               "setValue", "int");
00117         }
00119         virtual void setValue(const std::string &) {
00120             throw WrongParameterTypeException("FunctionParameterValueBase",
00121                                               "setValue", "std::string");
00122         }
00123 
00124         virtual void setValue(const char *) = 0;
00125 
00126         virtual operator double() = 0;                  
00127         virtual operator unsigned() = 0;                
00128         virtual operator int() = 0;                     
00129         virtual operator std::string() = 0;             
00130 
00131         virtual std::string toString() = 0;             
00132     };
00133 
00135 
00146 template <typename T> class FunctionParameterValue:
00147         public FunctionParameterValueBase {
00148     public:
00149         FunctionParameterValue<T>(const T &_value): value(_value) { }
00150 
00152         virtual void setValue(const char *);
00153 
00156         virtual operator double() {
00157             throw WrongParameterTypeException("FunctionParameterValue", "operator double", "");
00158             return 0.;
00159         }
00160 
00163         virtual operator unsigned() {
00164             throw WrongParameterTypeException("FunctionParameterValue", "operator unsigned", "");
00165             return 0;
00166         }
00167 
00170         virtual operator int() {
00171             throw WrongParameterTypeException("FunctionParameterValue", "operator int", "");
00172             return 0;
00173         }
00174 
00177         virtual operator std::string() {
00178             throw WrongParameterTypeException("FunctionParameterValue", "operator std::string", "");
00179             return toString();
00180         }
00181 
00182         virtual std::string toString() {
00183             std::ostringstream o;
00184             o << value << std::ends;
00185             return o.str();
00186         }
00187     private:
00188         T value;
00189 };

00211 class FunctionParameter {
00212     public:
00213         FunctionParameter(const std::string &_name,
00214                           const std::string &_description = "");
00215         ~FunctionParameter();
00216 
00218         operator double();
00220         operator unsigned();
00222         operator int();
00224         operator std::string();
00225 
00227         const std::string &getName() const;
00229         void setName(const std::string &_name);
00231         const std::string &getDescription() const;
00233         void setDescription(const std::string &_description);
00234 
00236 
00240         template<typename T> void setValue(FunctionParameterValue<T> *_value) {
00241             pImpl->value.reset ( _value );
00242         }
00243 
00245         void setValue(std::string _value);
00246 
00248 
00252         template<typename T> void setDefaultValue(FunctionParameterValue<T> *_defaultValue ) {
00253             pImpl->defaultValue.reset(_defaultValue);
00254         }
00255 
00256         FunctionParameterValueBase *value() const;
00257         FunctionParameterValueBase *defaultValue() const;
00258 
00259     private:
00260         //  these accessors are never used, but i like to keep them around
00261 //         std::auto_ptr<FunctionParameterValueBase> value() {
00262 //             return pImpl->value;
00263 //         }
00264 //         const std::auto_ptr<FunctionParameterValueBase> value() const {
00265 //             return pImpl->value;
00266 //         }
00267 //         std::auto_ptr<FunctionParameterValueBase> defaultValue() {
00268 //             return pImpl->defaultValue;
00269 //         }
00270 
00272         struct Impl {
00273             Impl(const std::string &_name,
00274                           const std::string &_description = ""):
00275                     name(_name), description(_description), value(0),
00276                     defaultValue(0) {}
00277             ~Impl() { }
00278             std::string name;
00279             std::string description;
00280             std::auto_ptr<FunctionParameterValueBase> value;
00281             std::auto_ptr<FunctionParameterValueBase> defaultValue;
00282         };
00283         Impl *pImpl;
00284 };

00289 class ParameterFac {
00290     public:
00292         template <typename T>
00293                 FunctionParameter *createParameterWithValue(
00294                     const std::string &_name, const T &_value) {
00295             FunctionParameter *tmp = new FunctionParameter(_name);
00296             tmp->setValue(new FunctionParameterValue<T>(_value));
00297 
00298             return tmp;
00299         }
00300 
00302         template <typename T>
00303                 FunctionParameter *createParameterWithDefault(
00304                     const std::string &_name, const T &_default,
00305                     const std::string &_description = "") {
00306             FunctionParameter *tmp = new FunctionParameter(_name, _description);
00307             tmp->setDefaultValue(new FunctionParameterValue<T>(_default));
00308             tmp->setValue(new FunctionParameterValue<T>(_default));
00309 
00310             return tmp;
00311         }
00312 };

00318 typedef Loki::SingletonHolder<ParameterFac> ParameterFactory;
